name: Crush it !
description:
You play as a little dino who just woke up and wants to destroy the city ! But since you are still young, you need to be careful about your needs.

Game made in one week for a "Mobile game"  theme. The goal was to be able to do shorts session of game.

! The text is in french, but you can still play it without reading. The learning will juste be a little longer... !

You can fin the assets used on my ArtStation :

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/BmlmwA
